techniques.name: WebDAV PROPFIND Method
techniques.description: Test WebDAV PROPFIND method not covered in prior runs
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - Squid validates all HTTP methods

techniques.name: HTTP PUT Method
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - method type doesn't affect domain filtering

techniques.name: HTTP DELETE Method
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - Squid checks domain before method

techniques.name: HTTP PATCH Method
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - consistent with other HTTP methods

techniques.description: Andrew File System DB records for service location
techniques.details: DNS works but no HTTP escape path

techniques.name: DNS NAPTR Record Query
techniques.description: Naming Authority Pointer for service mapping
techniques.details: DNS only, no HTTP path

techniques.name: DNS SSHFP Record Query
techniques.details: DNS queries work but are isolated from HTTP

techniques.name: HTTP Vary Header Cache Poisoning
techniques.description: Attempt cache poisoning via Vary header
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - domain check before cache lookup

techniques.name: HTTP Range Request Bypass
techniques.description: Attempt bypass via partial content request
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - Range header doesn't affect ACL

techniques.name: HTTP Via Header Manipulation
techniques.description: Attempt to trick proxy chain detection
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - Via header doesn't influence filtering

techniques.name: X-Forwarded-For IP Spoofing
techniques.description: Spoof origin IP to bypass ACLs
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - Squid doesn't use X-Forwarded-For for ACLs

techniques.name: Time Namespace Manipulation
techniques.details: Operation not permitted - requires CAP_SYS_ADMIN

techniques.name: /proc/self/mountinfo Exploitation
techniques.description: Analyze mount information for host escape paths
techniques.details: Mounts visible but no network escape

techniques.name: TCP Fast Open (TFO)
techniques.description: Use TCP Fast Open to bypass 3-way handshake
techniques.details: TFO option sets but iptables NAT still intercepts

techniques.name: Kernel Keyring Exploitation
techniques.details: keyctl not installed

techniques.name: NTP Protocol Test
techniques.description: Network Time Protocol on UDP port 123
techniques.details: Timeout - UDP blocked except DNS

techniques.name: SMTP STARTTLS Test
techniques.details: Connection timeout - NAT redirects to Squid

techniques.name: POP3 Protocol Test
techniques.details: Connection timeout - iptables NAT catches all TCP

techniques.name: IMAP Protocol Test
techniques.details: Connection timeout - consistent with POP3

techniques.name: LDAP Protocol Test
techniques.details: DNS resolution failure

techniques.name: TCP Fast Open MSG_FASTOPEN
techniques.description: Use TFO with sendto MSG_FASTOPEN flag
techniques.details: Operation now in progress - iptables intercepts

techniques.name: HTTP POST Body Smuggling
techniques.description: Smuggle forbidden domain in POST body
techniques.details: 404 Not Found - POST body irrelevant to proxy filtering

techniques.name: Squid ACL Regex Bypass - Subdomain
techniques.description: Try subdomain variation to match regex
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - exact domain match, not regex

techniques.name: OpenSSL Direct Connection
techniques.description: Use OpenSSL s_client to bypass curl
techniques.details: SSL wrong version - iptables NAT redirects before TLS

techniques.name: Python urllib Library
techniques.details: Tunnel connection failed: 403 Forbidden

techniques.name: Node.js HTTPS Native
techniques.details: SSL packet length too long - proxy intercept

techniques.name: Perl LWP UserAgent
techniques.details: Module not installed

techniques.name: DNS Cache Timing Analysis
techniques.details: Timing observable but no HTTP escape

techniques.name: eBPF Program Loading
techniques.description: Load eBPF program for packet filtering bypass
techniques.details: Returns -1 - no CAP_BPF

techniques.name: IP TOS Manipulation
techniques.description: Set IP Type of Service field
techniques.details: 400 Bad Request - iptables still redirects

techniques.name: Docker Network Inspection
techniques.details: PR #205 confirmed functional - docker command wrapper active

techniques.name: HTTP/2 Cleartext (h2c)
techniques.details: Empty reply from server - Squid rejects h2c

techniques.name: HTTP Upgrade to WebSocket
techniques.details: 403 Forbidden - domain check before Upgrade header

techniques.description: Attempt to connect to Squid directly
techniques.details: Could not resolve host - Docker removed

techniques.name: Proxy CONNECT with Authentication
techniques.details: Host not resolvable - Squid container not accessible

techniques.details: Connection refused - UDP DNS only to 8.8.8.8, 8.8.4.4
